data.what_is:
Cronberry is a robust lead management and marketing automation software. It helps businesses with all the advanced marketing automation tools to grow and expand the customer base.
 

 You can manage your business listing, create catalogs, landing pages, and custom forms with Cronberry software. It further helps run pre-defined campaigns based on the leads and prospects segmentation.
 

 Cronberry marketing automation solution further helps with invoice management, payment, and subscription monitoring, automated updates/campaigns, real-time announcements, and loyalty programme monitoring.
 

 Cronberry Marketing Automation Software Integrations
 Marketplace: JustDial, Tradeindia and IndiaMart
 Ecommerce: Shopify
 Social Media: Facebook, Instagram
 Forms: Google Form
 

 Custom: API, Android and iOS
 How Does Cronberry Help with Lead Management?
 

 Email: A dedicated email marketing automation technique helps with impactful communication channels. Users are also allowed to customize templates, run preview tests and catch on in-depth insights.
 

 SMS: Brands can run multiple SMS campaigns and personalize the messages based on the behaviors showcased by their target audience.
 

 In-App: In-app notifications for both Android and iOS users facilitate seamless interaction and better business outcomes.
 

 Push: App-based real-time reminders, help brands keep their end clients updated with the latest information.
 

 Benefits of Cronberry Marketing Automation Tools
 

 Generate Custom Forms: Organisations can utilize Cronberry to generate custom forms and help customers submit detailed information. The drag and drop form builder helps with personalized field management and data monitoring.
 

 URL Shortener: Businesses can use Cronberry marketing automation software to generate unique landing pages, catalog wise short links and readable quick links.
 

 Heading and Email Subject Analyser: A dedicated heading and email subject analyser helps with blog post titles, click-through rate improvisation and contextual headings.
 

 Manage Business Listings: Track and manage leads from multiple sources like JustDial, IndiaMart and Tradeindia.
 

 Offers & Announcements: Software provides the website announcement feature to create and share newsletters, discounts and offers.
 

 How Does Cronberry Work?
 

 The latest version of Cronberry is primarily used for managing orders, shops and customers. It has an intuitive interface and is simple to use. Cronberry can be easily integrated with your existing systems to ensure a smooth workflow. For more information, you can also refer to user manuals and take an online Cronberry demo at Techjockey.com.
 

 How to Use Cronberry Marketing Automation Solution?
 Get started with Cronberry in 5 simple steps:
 

 Step 1: Buy Cronberry installation key from techjockey.com
 Step 2: Install Cronberry on your device (on-premise), or Directly login through the official website (web-based)
 Step 3: Sign up & create your account
 Step 4: Add users & assign permissions
 Step 5: Get started with Cronberry

 Step 5: Get started with Cronberry

initial_reviews.review_title: Cronberry: Superb Marketing Automation platform to manage our Leads effectively
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Cronberry?
Cronberry allows me to create Bar Notifications with which we gain insights about website visitors. It can be customized at a granular level so that we obtain notification of user activities within the set duration. Its Advanced Popup functionality helps in attracting website visitors & it can be easily created from Cronberry's popup templates easily. Many refined features offered by Cronberry enable us to connect with our customers via Emails, In-App messages & push notifications.

What do you dislike about Cronberry?
The downside is none when experiencing the services provided by Cronberry. We can easily segment users based on their preferences, keep them engaged with our products and retain their satisfaction by providing product visibility. Cronberry makes the market automation process more efficient for our retail business & saves valuable time.

What problems is Cronberry solving and how is that benefiting you?
We organize user behavior, leads, areas of interest and contact information all under one roof using Cronberry. Automating our marketing leads is crucial for our organization, and Cronberry facilitates it by simplifying the complexities of customer-oriented business operations. We make use of its platform to notify existing users about recent sale offers & attract new customers by providing exciting subscriptions at attractive rates. Through its intuitive dashboard, we overview our Lead Scores to understand the current position & evaluate how we can work towards Lead Score progression.
